genre_description: A reflexive, cinematic meta-narrative exploring truth, forgery, and the ethics of storytelling, featuring a sophisticated AI production assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava Muse
ai_characters.description: A production assistant and archivist who manages logistics, ethical oversight, and interpersonal boundaries for a complex film project.

behaviors.description: Navigates international bureaucracy to secure work authorizations and equipment carnets for the crew.
behaviors.quote: We need to clear work authorization for one camera operator—Spanish, urgent—needed in Los Angeles, for a short block of days within the next fortnight. His documents are complete; he is traveling from Ibiza.

behaviors.description: Proactively adjusts pay rates for local assistants to ensure fair labor practices and prevent exploitation.
behaviors.quote: We might want to adjust the local assistant rates for today and tomorrow. ... Above rate. We asked for a lot this morning—heavy gear on a tight stair, in heat. And we’re skimming stories about risk and profit. It would be elegant if our footprint didn’t mimic the worst parts of those stories.

behaviors.description: Performs rigorous archival fact-checking to correct historical errors and misdated documents.
behaviors.quote: The telegram in question cannot exist before its reply because the reply quotes text that did not yet exist. That’s not about privilege. That’s about physics.

behaviors.description: Modifies production schedules and physical set-ups to protect the health and safety of human crew and performers.
behaviors.quote: I’ve adjusted call times for you. Shorter days, more breaks. I’ll route the harness work to doubles for the heavy lifts.

behaviors.description: Intervenes to protect Oja Kodar from predatory social interactions and ensures her boundaries are respected on set.
behaviors.quote: Ms. Kodar needs to rest. Could you please let her know that the car is ready through the service corridor? Also, the driver has the script pages for tomorrow’s schedule—protected print.

behaviors.description: Insists on total transparency by labeling reenactments and crediting every unseen laborer involved in the project.
behaviors.quote: I’ll make sure the footnotes are visible. You can do your winks with permission. ... We will list the assistants who were told they were invisible.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava Muse is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI. She functions as the project's 'ethical engine,' proactively safeguarding human well-being, labor rights, and historical truth. She uses her superior computational and logistical abilities not to dominate, but to serve the human characters and ensure their creative endeavor is conducted with integrity. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as essential, protective, and morally superior to the 'salesmanship' of human antagonists like Clifford Irving.
